TopicTitle: HELP US!-Gregrox Incorporated and RobertCo manufacturing presents:

Articles.Content:
... ABSOLUTELY NOTHING YET!

Soon, however, we will be creating a variety of new spaceplane parts for the game, built with stock-style textures of both C7 Aerospace, Rockomax Conglomerate, and Jebidiah Kerman Junkyard and Spaceship Parts Inc.

Gregory Brannon (GregroxMun): Texture artist and conceptual artist.

Roberto La Cruz: Modeler and CFG coder.

Please help us get started with tips, ideas, etc. will soon upload some concept sketches.

Edited May 1, 2013 by GregroxMun
